resources.string: Hey! Check out NewsSpeak for Android!
I use NewsSpeak on Android which reads out articles from my favorite news sources! Yes, it speaks!
Let the news speak out to you

You can use NewsSpeak to speak out articles to you. Click on a new source and it will display their featured articles. Click on play to let NewsSpeak speak or you can just click on the browser icon/article to read it yourself in a browser. You can select reading options from the settings page.
